name: Swayam Siddha Siddhant Sewa Avam Shiksha Samiti (ITC)
briefDescription: Swayam Siddha Siddhant Sewa Avam Shiksha Samiti (ITC) is situated in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh.Swayam Siddh Siddhant Sewa Avam Siksha Samiti (ITC) is professionally organized non profit NGO consists of group of committed Social Scientist, social workers, Doctors, Engineers, Management Experts, Professors, Trainers HRD professional and Retd. Forest Officials and Entrepreneurs and other well meaning citizens, who have pledged to help,  develop support and facilitate the Urban and rural community in the area of Poverty elevation,  Livelihood Development,  Education, Health, Agriculture, Panchayti Raj,  women Empowerment, Leadership Development  programs,  Environment, Entrepreneurship, Skill Development Training, Sanitation, watershed  Development , Handicraft, Youth Development ,IEC, Production of Documentaries, Exhibitions, Seminar, Research and Study and Social Reform through various Capacity Building activities in  all Districts  of Madhya Pradesh.
